chunk_text: ● A full vendor list must be sent to WHV 90 days prior to the wedding. ● Staffing & Gratuity - 15% of the determined venue fee will be added to the total venue costs. ● Proof of Insurance- A liability insurance policy naming the holder as well as West Hills Vineyards LLC as an additional insured shall be presented at the start of the event. This policy will be in effect from the beginning of the event until everyone has vacated the premises. ● The time allowed is from 9 AM until 10 PM.
